SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bike
The Bike class extends the Vehicle class and represents a bike with additional attributes such as whether it has gears and its engine capacity.
Car
The Car class extends the Vehicle class and represents a car with additional properties such as number of doors and whether it is automatic.
Response
The Response class is a generic response wrapper used by the controller to encapsulate results, status codes, messages, vehicle data, and total price.
StatusCode
The StatusCode enum represents standardized status codes used in controller responses to indicate success, client errors, or server failures.
Vehicle
The Vehicle class serves as the base class representing a generic vehicle with attributes such as brand, model, and rental price per day.
VehicleApp
The VehicleApp class serves as the entry point for the Vehicle Rental System.
VehicleController
The VehicleController class acts as a mediator between UI and the service layer.
VehicleFileAccessException
VehicleFileAccessException is a custom checked exception thrown when there is an issue accessing or reading the vehicle data file.
VehicleFileDAO
Utility class for loading vehicle data from a file.
VehicleService
The VehicleService class provides business logic for managing vehicles in the rental system.
VehicleServiceException
VehicleServiceException is a custom checked exception used to indicate issues in the business logic of the vehicle service layer.
